text: José Mentor Guilherme de Mello Netto (30 September 1948 – 25 July 2020), better known simply as José Mentor, was a Brazilian lawyer and politician. He was a Federal Deputy from 2003 to 2019. Mentor was a member of the Workers' Party. Mentor died on 25 July 2020 in São Paulo from COVID-19, aged 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Workers' Party (Brazil) politicians Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in São Paulo Category:Politicians from São Paulo (state)
title: José Mentor
